member.name: T:Microsoft.AspNet.SignalR.SqlServer.ObservableDbOperation
member.summary: A DbOperation that continues to execute over and over as new results arrive. Will attempt to use SQL Query Notifications, otherwise falls back to a polling receive loop.

member.summary: Note this blocks the calling thread until a SQL Query Notification can be set up

member.name: T:Microsoft.AspNet.SignalR.SqlServer.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.SignalR.SqlServer.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.SignalR.SqlServer.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.SignalR.SqlServer.Resources.Error_SignalRSQLScaleOutNewerThanCurrentVersion
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to SignalR SQL scale out schema is newer than the currently executing version..

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.SignalR.SqlServer.Resources.Error_StreamIndexOutOfRange
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The streamIndex value {0} is higher than the maximum configured index {1}.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.SignalR.SqlServer.Resources.Error_UnexpectedSqlNotificationType
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to An unexpected SqlNotificationType was received. Details: Type={0}, Source={1}, Info={2}.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.SignalR.SqlServer.Resources.Error_UnsupportedSqlEdition
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The SQL Server edition of the target server is unsupported, e.g. SQL Azure..

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.SignalR.SqlServer.Resources.Error_ValueMustBeGreaterThan1
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Unsupported value for parameter '{0}'. The value must be greater than 1..

member.name: T:Microsoft.AspNet.SignalR.SqlServer.SqlMessageBus
member.summary: Uses SQL Server tables to scale-out SignalR applications in web farms.

member.name: T:Microsoft.AspNet.SignalR.SqlScaleoutConfiguration
member.summary: Settings for the SQL Server scale-out message bus implementation.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.SignalR.SqlScaleoutConfiguration.ConnectionString
member.summary: The SQL Server connection string to use.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNet.SignalR.SqlScaleoutConfiguration.TableCount
member.summary: The number of tables to store messages in. Using more tables reduces lock contention and may increase throughput. This must be consistent between all nodes in the web farm. Defaults to 1.
